name: Interrupting Goat
description:
He'll interrupt you, your friends, coworkers, dinner, funerals, and pretty much anything else. He doesn't even care – he's a goat.

Just try having a conversation with the goat, he dares you.

Features
  • Features a goat.
  • Playdate compatible!
  • Surprises.
  • Based on the "award winning" Android app!
  • We wouldn't really call this a game. It's more of a toy to annoy your spouse.
